title: UPDATED: Pidcock Shatters Power Record and Secures First GC Victory in ‘Fairy Tale’ Debut
content:
'I set a new 5–10-minute power record:' Pidcock crowned overall winner to silence critics in high-pressure debut with Q36.5.

Read the full article at UPDATED: Pidcock Shatters Power Record and Secures First GC Victory in ‘Fairy Tale’ Debut on Velo.
author: ahood
